overview: California Dreaming is a Lust Cinema Original porn film directed by Inka Winter in the USA in 2021. The movie follows Elijah (Oliver Davis) as he drives through California and looks back on his recently broken relationship with Jane (Jane Rogers). Blending romance and fantasy, this movie will take you back in time to the 17th century Wild Wild West. Sounds fantastical? It is.
title: California Dreaming
